data.title: Iranian President recognizes the Holocaust, calls it a crime against the Jews
Eddie Izzard declares he will stand for London mayor in 2020

Iran's new president: Yes, the Holocaust happened. Whatever criminality they committed against the Jews we condemn. The taking of human life is contemptible. It makes no difference whether that life is a Jewish life, Christian or Muslim.
